text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ese ntimubona ibigirwamana byanyu mugaragira bitari Allah? Nimunyereke icyo byaremye ku isi. Ese byaba byaragize uruhare mu iremwa ry’ibirere, ahubwo se twaba twarabahaye igitabo bakaba ari cyo bakomoramo ibimenyetso bigaragara bagenderaho? (Oya!) Ahubwo ibyo ababangikanyamana bamwe basezeranya abandi ni ibinyoma.”
